refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The resume element represents a single &resume; or curriculum vitae (CV). It is a summary of a person's experience that is revelant to employment.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: resume may be contained in these elements: <$PARENTS$>

listitem.para: A string used to uniquely identify a &resume;. The &resume; may then be referred to by this identifier.
